author: wn.com
title: WFP Focuses On Reaching Most Needy Bhutan Refugees, As Funding Declines (WFP - World Food ...
text: ( Source : WFP - World Food Programme ) KATHMANDU - Most Bhutan refugees in Nepal will receive a 30 per cent smaller food ration from next year as part of an effort by the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP) to stretch limited resources
